$listening_address_desc.en: The address to listen for SSE connections.

$listening_address_validate.zh: 监听地址必须是一个有效的URL。
$listening_address_validate.en: The listening address must be a valid URL.

$load_tools_from_mcp_over_mqtt_servers_l.zh: 从 MCP over MQTT 服务端加载工具
$load_tools_from_mcp_over_mqtt_servers_l.en: Load Tools from MCP over MQTT Servers

$load_tools_from_mcp_over_mqtt_servers_d.zh: 启用后，系统将通过 MCP over MQTT 服务端加载工具。
$load_tools_from_mcp_over_mqtt_servers_d.en: When enabled, the system will load tools from MCP over MQTT servers.
